name: T O W E R - 8 0
description:
A synthwave version of Tower Color mobile game !

How to play :
Use your finger to move the target. When you release  your finger, you'll shoot a LAZER at the point targetted. Cylinders are destroyed when the laser's color match the cylinder's one.

Music from Violet Delta :

Again, here is his bancamp too : https://violetdelta.bandcamp.com/

I like a lot that kind of stuff ! :D
